item.title: VPAC Info Tutorial, by Vertu | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2786
item.description: Description of this map: I have tampered with the original PAC stuff to the point that I basically made another form of PAC. VPAC will feature more advanced and developed units than PAC and feature more developed enemy bases using custom units regularlly. I have provided an informative tutorial that can be used to help understand the more complex dynamics. Just know, it’s going to be a lot of information.

item.title: [LPAC] Mighty Bulwark, by Azurian | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2606
item.description: Right about halfway through the map the game seemed to freeze, quickly saved and reloaded the map to save humanity from creeper! Description of this map: This is a Lightweight Play As Creeper (LPAC) map designed to be approachable by all players. Three unique custom weapons/tools are available. See the intro A.D.A. message to learn how to play. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!
